ygData.subject: Spells to change suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: I wish to please all wich agree with my idea to a.) petition idea b.) feedback idea c.) email to verant it if you can find a email of spell sugestions 1.
ygData.messageBody:
I wish to please all wich agree with my idea to

a.) petition idea
b.) feedback idea
c.) email to verant it if you can find a email of spell sugestions

1. Wizard is hevy hitter low survivibility class with nice FADE, Shadow
step serie escape spells YES?? NOOOOOO

He is a looser if he uses his spells as this spells are RANDOM so it will
teleport you anywere maybe also in middle of monsters!! so it is russian
rulet type spell. i used it 20 30 times in times of need and only 3 times
did i escape a fate. It sometime teleport you in back of monster sometime
in middle of zoo sometime just into zone so you force zone out and
sometimes so long awey that until you find where are you and where to run
monsters again cach on you.
This spell is nearly inutilizable in this state as it is now so please
suggest changes that dont make it too powerfull but at last usefull.

My suggestion is:

This line of spells can be fast and directed !! so when you cast it it will
move you some space from 5 to 10 seconds advantage from monster in
direction where you look "not random direction". to compensate it i will
put long recovery time on all spells so you cannot use it to teleport and
then open fire then again teleport then fire again and so on. ( if there
can be some random number so that if you teleport to max range you can turn
and fire but until you turn monsters will cach you if you are not
teleported farr enough.!




Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)



http:\\www.tip.it/wizard
moderator
